analysis.key_quote: The proposed creation of a new "Schedule Policy/Career" (P/C) employment category, effectively making a significant portion of the civil service "at-will," introduces a critical and perhaps overlooked vulnerability: a significant degradation of our national cybersecurity posture due to induced workforce instability and diminished institutional knowledge in secure practices.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the degradation of cybersecurity and institutional knowledge, as well as the lack of due process for employees, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and politicization.
